title: Teemo & Karthus disabled in One For All queue
body:
Heya guys, quick PSA. 

Teemo and Karthus have historically been disabled in the One For All game mode (their core fantasies create a degenerate play pattern for the opposing team, that goes above and beyond what the other champions can accomplish), but this morning they were accidentally still enabled for a few hours. We've since disabled them in the One For All queue.

You can still use Teemo & Karthus in custom games if you want to though, on the map of your choice! :D

replies.body: What's the point of the ban phase then?

So Teemo{{champion:17}}  is a problem and Heimerdinger{{champion:74}}  is not? 

We do have a banning phase in this mode. No reason to disable anybody {{item:3070}}

Teemo isn't a problem with 5 minute duration shrooms. This is silly. I played it a few times in PBE and it was by no means OP. Nowhere near as powerful as Heimerdinger, Morde, Darius, Shaco, Lux, Tahm Kench, etc.

A) Holy crap Mordekaiser.

B) I'm so relieved that they don't all get a dragon minion.
in a 5 man premade we played donger twice. ezreal destroyed us and maokai just 5x ultied for the ace... donger is fun but shite in one for all
{{champion:17}}  and {{champion:30}}  wants you to **downvote this thread to unban them!!**

Meanwhile.. Darius ! 

We played Teemo vs Darius, guess who was concerned by "their core fantasies create a degenerate play pattern for the opposing team" :)
Let's walk in. And press Q. And Win... = 5 Darius's in a nutshell. (THEY DONT EVEN HAVE TO ULT AND THEIR PASSIVES WORK TOGETHER)
While with Teemo, their poisons literally counter each other because they don't stack on top of each other.
Same thing with Malz's E. Huge damage loss and never going to try Malz on OfA again >.<
Does 5 Malz not work if some (if not all) go AD?

You can but a lot of Malz's reliable damage is in his E's DoT. 

The DoTs override each other so unless you can coordinate who you are going to E then you lose a lot of your damage potential.

This is so true, + the fact that Darius can just build full tank of the opposing team's damage type and become unkillable as well. Granted you cant build a single defence some games because they could have different damage type builds but usually you can.
But when they do ult together, my god is it hilarious.
you want hilarious chain ulting go urgot CX

"their core fantasies create a degenerate play pattern for the opposing team"

in other words, the turds who play one for all are too lazy to buy a banshees and will proceed to spam support tickets about how unfair those champs are.

OFA was never meant to be fair or balanced.  If it was, champions like Syndra and Darius would also be perma-banned.  Disabling champions for low stakes game modes is a terrible decision that saddles Riot with the burden of vetting champions every time they roll out a gimmicky play mode.  This should NOT be the case. 

You made the champions, we bought them, now let us play the champions that we want without having to bounce from custom game to custom game for half an hour only to get stuck with 5-man Yi.
Won vs {{champion:30}} earlier before he was disabled with {{champion:45}} .  Just built tank+ap and {{item:3060}} +{{item:3512}} .  We just all took {{summoner:12}}  and split pushed all day.
So much for the claim that "all champions" would be available for this mode. Two exceptions equals two direct lies to your community.
Sounds like we need a Karthus vs Teemo custom deathmatch

> [{quoted}](name=Merxamers,realm=NA,application-id=LFfTlAky,discussion-id=2ENgzMTO,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-15T19:49:06.084+0000)
>
> Sounds like we need a Karthus vs Teemo custom deathmatch

Karthus would win. His ult is broken in OFA
Might as well get rid of the ban phase then riot, if your going to ban people yourself.

With the 5 minute shrooms, Teemo is FAR less oppressive of a pick than he was last year. He shouldn't be disabled in this mode, he has numerous counters and plenty of other champions are far more oppressive.
You should consider Mordekaiser.  Did that against a team of monkeys and it was disgusting how big we got.
If a team of 5 Mordes takes dragon, do they get 5 ghosts?

Yeah, Morde is much worse. In PBE, my team played him and could force a teamfight at 12 minutes, win because we have insane sustain, then push 100% into their base and end without anyone needing to recall and killing them as they respawn.

Teemo isn't even a problem with his 5 minute duration shrooms. And I played it quite a few times on PBE... Not at all OP.

Have you fixed Teemo's bug yet?  The one introduced when he gained thrown/bouncing and (too high) hit-count health?)  Shrooms arming while inside true sight/trap detection (briefly?) _**stealth through it**_ and screw up the auto-pathing of melees trying to clear them so that they run straight into them instead.
The shrooms should arm even when if enemy team have true sight (though, they should be revealed constantly, so that might be a bug (can't say I encountered it though)).

> [{quoted}](name=Sozan5,realm=EUNE,application-id=LFfTlAky,discussion-id=2ENgzMTO,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2015-10-16T13:03:02.840+0000)
>
> The shrooms should arm even when if enemy team have true sight (though, they should be revealed constantly, so that might be a bug (can't say I encountered it though)).

The point is that they stealth THROUGH the reveal.  Arming by itself is not a problem.  The problem is when you are a melee champion safely attacking it and it vanishes anyway, forcing you to auto-path straight into it and explode.

I'm sorry, but after having played a few games so far, Heimer and Darius are far more abusive than Teemo or Karthus.  Heimers can push down to Inhib in the first 6 minutes if you don't aram and Darius is just "GG, First Win of the Day" in a nutshell.

everyone is {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} over {{champion:17}} being disabled poor {{champion:30}} how is he broken in one for all ? ban {{champion:122}}  or {{champion:223}}  who have just broken passives that the others in their team can stack !!! XD {{summoner:30}}
got a teemo mirror match this morning it was hilarious

So you'll ban teemo and Kathus who create a "degenerate play pattern" EVEN THOugh ItS EAsILy Countered, But you wont ban:
Lux, For having infinite cc on a 5 second cool down, coupled with instaburst that fucking Syrian refugees can feel
Morgana, who makes kids autistic kids with polio look more mobile than the opposing team
Heimer, when Nuking japan wasn't enough, you threw heimer into OFA, whos has 8 times the current Dong Bombs that japan felt
Darius, who can dunk you into the Nth dimension
Tahm kench, Because whats more satisfying than eating more than paula dean
Shaco, because my asshole just wasn't loose enough after the lux encounter
Vladimir, Because apparently fuck you and everything you're worth
And Zyra, Because whats more fun than getting knocked up more times than a rich teenage white girl.
Honestly, if you are going to bitch about negative gameplay, Now, in a game mode that will end sooner than a few weeks you better fucking address the issues plaguing average league players everyday in Normals. don't you dare assume that you can determine whats " Degenerate play pattern" when you can barely determine whats healthy gameplay either, In A CONTROLLED SCENARIO. hands down the worst Gaming corporation ive ever seen. GG rito, hope your game dies within the next year
and i you

{{champion:1}} {{champion:268}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:63}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:74}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:83}}...but this is ok???????????????????

> [{quoted}](name=Arde Liliruca,realm=NA,application-id=LFfTlAky,discussion-id=2ENgzMTO,comment-id=002b,timestamp=2015-10-18T02:28:29.801+0000)
>
> {{champion:1}} {{champion:268}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:63}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:74}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:83}}...but this is ok???????????????????

Outrange Annie. Burst down Azir. Be someone with a good engage for Blitzcrank who can punish grabs, or just build MR and crush them mid game. Burst Brand down. Don't know about Ekko. Don't know about Cass. Pick Gnar or anyone who can kite and kick Darius ass. Don't know about Fizz. Just fucking ban Garen from the start. Outrange Heimerdinger. Kalista? Really? Outrange Kat. Learn how to dodge skillshots for Lux. Forfeit for Yorick. And lastly, get better at the game, which you probably need to do.

if you cant outrange annie then what? it's kind of hard to burst down 5 azirs, you know o4a is blind right so kinda hard to pick someone with good engage for blitz, once again bursting down 5 brands all with those bouncing ults and aoe is pretty hard, again this is blind so if you dont have a kiting champ youre fucked against 5 darius's, same problem with annie applies to heimer, the thing about dodging skillshots is if they hit even 1 bind youre dead, 5 kalistas with that mobility and rend, and AGAIN we run into the blindness of o4a and not being able to for sure outrange kat. get better at logic, which you definitly need to do dumbass.

So, what you're telling me is that since you and many other people have gotten bad matchups with the enemy team, the champions that they used should be disabled? It all depends on the matchup, if you could outrange Annie and kill her every single game then she would be trash and no one would use her. Hope you understand better. Sorry I came across as such a dick, I get mad seeing people complain about the same champions over and over again.

No champs should be disabled, we have banning for a reason. But if the logic they used when disabling karth and teemo is it would be broken and unfun, thats retarded because the champions I listed create the same op scenarios. Disabling champions altogether in a for fun game mode is dumb shit
Logged in to upvote. I've had matches as heim and blitz, hilariously op.

Karthus kinda makes sense. If 5 karthi (the plural of karthus) ulted together that would be silly. But that is the point of this game mode and they can only do it every couple of minutes.

Also we have a banning phase dammit.

I agree, no one should be disabled. Their disabled for their "degenerate play pattern" they bring to the table.  Really! Of all things for this issue, you choose to disable the champions.  C'mon. For one thing your disabling the champion for being himself/herself, and that's just wrong. For another thing that is what banning phase is for, and at the end of the game when you have a degenerate player or players and not degenerate champions, that's what the report button is for.
Aaaaaaand I'm sad now.
What about champions that create a degenerate play pattern in normal games? Your should permanently disable Leblanc, Fizz, and Singed because of the play pattern they create.

Oh come on...

I would have loved to play Teemo, and there are much worse game composition champs for one-for-all queue out there. Not cool!
signed in just to down vote --.--
I literally waited all day to get home from work to play this and you tell me Teemo is disabled.  <^> Rito
Could you disabled Darius and Tahm while you're at it? Most champs have zero way to deal with these guys in one for all.

We can all agree that {{champion:115}} is the best for trolling {{champion:115}} {{champion:115}} {{champion:115}} {{champion:115}} {{champion:115}} {{champion:115}} {{champion:115}} {{champion:115}} {{champion:115}} {{champion:115}} {{champion:115}} {{champion:115}} {{champion:115}} {{champion:115}} {{champion:115}} {{champion:115}}
